;;; TOOL: run-interp
(module
  (func $f (param i32) (result i32)
    block (result i32)
      local.get 0
      i32.const 0
      i32.eq
      if
        i32.const 1
        br 1
      end
      i32.const 2
    end)

  (func (export "test1") (result i32)
    i32.const 0
    call $f)

  (func (export "test2") (result i32)
    i32.const 1
    call $f))
(;; STDOUT ;;;
test1() => i32:1
test2() => i32:2
;;; STDOUT ;;)
